info.name: Aurora
info.description: Cool teal-purple glow with soft panels
info.author: Sample

colors.primary: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:0, stop:0 #6ad7e5, stop:1 #7c6ae5)
colors.secondary: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:1, stop:0 #7ee8b7, stop:1 #64c9f5)
colors.background: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:0, y2:1, stop:0 #0e1628, stop:1 #141c30)
colors.canvas: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:1, stop:0 #0a1222, stop:0.4 #11243a, stop:0.75 #1c3252, stop:1 #11243a)
colors.panel: qlineargradient(spread:pad, x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:1, stop:0 rgba(35,45,70,0.96), stop:1 rgba(24,32,52,0.9))
